message: {% extends "nexus/base.html" %}

so, I'm using @dcramer's excellent nexus admin app, and wanted to override the header
right... generally the pattern is to copy all the templates of a given app locally, and make edits on it.
oh, um, hm.
i thought it had to be named the same as the original in order to be found, but yeah, i see your point

so... i just need to replace it then? not extend?
aaand, there we go
I created a nexus/base.html template in my app's templates/ directory, and just put  a basic bit of code in it:

not as pretty as I'd like, but workable
